name: Capsule Catchers
description:
you have one goal, Get the capsules to there corresponding squares! however as time goes on, capsules spawn and get faster. This game will test your ability to think fast and will have you on the edge of your seat as Capsules Swarm you.

          there are 3 types of capsules

  • Red - Adds to score
  • blue - multiples score
  • gold - does all of the above, plus makes you move faster.

         There  are 2 maps

  • Castle
  • skate park

This is my first game with the Unity game engine, feed back on how i can improve future games are highly recommended. 

disclaimer: high scores wont save, project files got corrupted before i could implement a save feature
